channel.title: Fula on Pavel Iosad
channel.description: Recent content in Fula on Pavel Iosad

item.title: All that glistens is not gold
item.description: In this talk I argue that purely phonological (e.g. autosegmental) approaches to initial consonant mutations in languages such as Fula and Irish are insufficient to account for the facts fully. In many ways this does not represent my current thinking on these matters, as can be established by looking, for instance, at this paper.
